page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In underground tig we get into a circle and dip to see who is on.The last two people who are left are on.The rest have to go against a wall and put one of their arms against the wall and one of the people who are on has to go under them. And they all have to run away.The two people who are on have to run after them.If they tig them then they have to go against the wall and put their arm out .If someone is not tug and goes under the person who is tug ,the person who is tug can run again.If everybody is caught,the first and last are on.
